title: Spaghetti with broccoli pesto
description: Boost your five-a-day by swapping pine nuts for broccoli in this tangy pesto pasta. It’s ideal as a quick midweek supper that even the kids will eat. Equipment and preparation: You will need a food processor for this recipe.
ingredients: 350g/12oz broccoli (about one head), broken into florets
30g/1oz Parmesan, finely grated, plus extra to garnish
salt and freshly ground black pepper
